GroupCensusMember.name: GroupCensusMember
GroupCensusMember.description: Represents personal information about a member, for example employee or association member, or their dependents. GroupCensusMember is used to estimate the insurance plan cost for the group. This object is also used in the enrollment process to retrieve the member and dependent details. Child object of GroupCensus.

AccountId.description: The person account associated with the census member.

AnnualEligibleSalary.description: The census member's annual eligible salary, which is used to determine life insurance coverage.

City.description: The city detail for the address.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the census member.

Country.description: The country detail for the address.

DependentCount.description: Number of the census member's dependents. Children, parents, and parents-in-law are included in the number of dependents. Spouse isn't included in the number of dependents.

FullTimeEquivalent.description: Census member’s hours divided by the employer’s hours for a full-time work week. 1 is equal to full-time hours, 0.5 is 50% of the full-time equivalent.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the address.

GroupCensusId.description: The group census associated with the member.

GroupClassId.description: The group class associated with the census member.

IsOptOutAllPlans.description: Indicates whether the census member has opted out of all plans. Used to calculate OptOutCount for GroupCensus when RelationshipType is 'Self'.

IsPortalUser.description: Indicates whether the census member is created as a portal user.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address.

MemberKey.description: The hash key that’s used for identifying duplicate group census member records. By default, the hash key is a combination of First Name, Last Name, and Email ID.

OptOutPlanTypes.description: Specifies the plan types the census member opts out of.

PostalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

PrimaryGroupCensusMemberId.description: The primary group census member associated with the census member.

PrimaryMemberCategory.description: Specifies the category of the primary census member.

PrimaryMemberSource.description: External identifier of the primary member. Maximum size is 255 characters.

RelationshipToPrimaryMember.description: The census member's relationship to the primary member.

SmokerStatus.description: Specifies the smoking status of the user

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: Source System external ID of the group census member.

State.description: The state detail for the address.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the group census member.

Street.description: The street detail for the address.
